w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Grid system
w:HTMLPanel.p: A GridRow represents a <div class="row"> and a column is represented by a GridColumn whith size and offset attributes.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:GridRow> <w:GridColumn size="1">size ONE</w:GridColumn> <w:GridColumn size="1">size ONE</w:GridColumn> <w:GridColumn size="1">size ONE</w:GridColumn> <w:GridColumn size="1">size ONE</w:GridColumn> <w:GridColumn size="1">size ONE</w:GridColumn> <w:GridColumn size="1">size ONE</w:GridColumn> <w:GridColumn size="1">size ONE</w:GridColumn> <w:GridColumn size="1">size ONE</w:GridColumn> <w:GridColumn size="1">size ONE</w:GridColumn> <w:GridColumn size="1">size ONE</w:GridColumn> <w:GridColumn size="1">size ONE</w:GridColumn> <w:GridColumn size="1">size ONE</w:GridColumn> </w:GridRow> <w:GridRow> <w:GridColumn size="8">size EIGHT</w:GridColumn> <w:GridColumn size="4">size FOUR</w:GridColumn> </w:GridRow> <w:GridRow> <w:GridColumn size="4">size FOUR</w:GridColumn> <w:GridColumn size="4">size FOUR</w:GridColumn> <w:GridColumn size="4">size FOUR</w:GridColumn> </w:GridRow> <w:GridRow> <w:GridColumn size="6">size SIX</w:GridColumn> <w:GridColumn size="6">size SIX</w:GridColumn> </w:GridRow>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Offsetting columns
w:HTMLPanel.p: With the offset attribute you can easily specify the column offset.

The size and offset attributes are shortcuts for sizeMd and offsetMd attributes. You can also use the sizeXs, sizeSm, sizeLg and offsetXs, offsetSm, offsetLg attribute (see Bootrap documentation fore more information).

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:GridRow> <w:GridColumn size="4">size FOUR</w:GridColumn> <w:GridColumn size="4" offset="4">size FOUR offset FOUR</w:GridColumn> </w:GridRow> <w:GridRow> <w:GridColumn size="3" offset="3">size THREE offset THREE</w:GridColumn> <w:GridColumn size="3" offset="3">size THREE offset THREE</w:GridColumn> </w:GridRow> <w:GridRow> <w:GridColumn size="6" offset="3">size SIX offset THREE</w:GridColumn> </w:GridRow>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Nesting columns
w:HTMLPanel.p: Like in Twitter''s Bootstrap the grids can be nested.

w:GridRow.w:GridColumn:
Level ONE size NINE
Level TWO size SIX Level TWO size SIX

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:GridRow> <w:GridColumn size="9"> Level ONE size NINE <w:GridRow> <w:GridColumn size="6">Level TWO size SIX</w:GridColumn> <w:GridColumn size="6">Level TWO size SIX</w:GridColumn> </w:GridRow> </w:GridColumn> </w:GridRow>
